creator: preuss@disy.net
text:
http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/doc/i18n-doc/intro.html states

"For those not familiar with the term "i18n", it is a standard abbreviation 
for "internationalization", which starts with the letter I, ends with the 
letter N, and contains a total of 18 letters."

Actually, it has a *total* of *20* letters (if I'm counting correctly), and 18 
is the number of letters *between* the I and the N.
Thanks, its fixed in SVN, should refresh in the next nightly.
creator: rahul@apache.org
